{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Migratory Motor Complex (MMC) is a pattern of electrical activity observed in the gastrointestinal tract during fasting. According to Document [0], the MMC occurs every 90–230 minutes during the interdigestive phase. Document [6] also mentions that in humans, phase 3 recurs every 110 minutes.
